fields.label: Unexplained Bleeding
fields.title: Illness associated with fever and unexplained bleeding or death in human, livestock and/or wildlife

fields.label: Increased Death
fields.title: Increased death of human/livestock/wildlife  including aquatic plant and animals

fields.label: Difficulty Breathing
fields.title: Illness associated with fever, difficulty in breathing, skin conditions or abdominal pain or altered consciousness in human

fields.label: Pest Outbreak
fields.title: Pest outbreaks (rodents, quelea birds, locusts and fall armyworms) ,massive wilting of maize or banana associated with dying of leaves and premature plant death or dust like appearance (molds) in groundnuts or maize

fields.label: Extreme Weather
fields.title: Weather forecast and geological information- indicating extreme weather(floods, drought, landslide, cyclone, temperature) and environmental changes; vegetation cover, Decreasing or increasing of natural water reservoirs, earth quakes, tremor or damage of infrastructure

fields.label: Animal Behaviour
fields.title: Change of behaviour of one or more domestic or wild animals e.g. biting other animals or humans and other non-living things.

fields.label: Excessive Export
fields.title: Excessive export of agricultural produces (Rice, beans, potatoes) and food price volatility.

fields.label: Increase Abortion
fields.title: Increased abortion events in domestic or wild animals within a week.

fields.label: Weight Loss
fields.title: Illness associated with massive weight loss, enlarged lymphnodes, headaches, joint pains, swelling and itching in human, domestic and wild animals.

fields.label: Accident
fields.title: Accidents; Leakage of fuels, chemicals, radioactive materials, fire, marine and traffic

fields.label: Chemical Usage
fields.title: Excessive application /purchase of pesticide /medicine or other chemicals.

fields.label: Unusual Migration
fields.title: Unusual migration of human/livestock/wildlife from their natural residence to other areas

fields.label: Social Instability
fields.title: Political instability, societal disputes(abuse, rape, fight), and other events causing social instability and are against human rights
